revision.text:
{{talkheader}} {{WikiProject Military history|class=B <!-- B-Class 5-criteria checklist --> |B1 <!-- Referencing and citations --> =y |B2 <!-- Coverage and accuracy --> =y |B3 <!-- Structure --> =y |B4 <!-- Grammar and style --> =y |B5 <!-- Supporting materials --> =y |Historiography=y|WWI=y}}
== New material == Narratives of two later analyses of the OH added, with a narrative of OH 1917 II for comparison and some concusions stashed in a Note.[[User:Keith-264|Keith-264]] ([[User talk:Keith-264|talk]]) 05:09, 14 July 2012 (UTC)
== Collectors' Guide == Added Collectors' Guide for information.[[User:Keith-264|Keith-264]] ([[User talk:Keith-264|talk]]) 06:45, 16 July 2012 (UTC)
== Only the Army? == Naval operations volumes also carry the title "Official History of the Great War Based on Official Documents by Direction of the Historical Section of the Committee of Imperial Defence."
Should they not be mentioned? [[User:GraemeLeggett|GraemeLeggett]] ([[User talk:GraemeLeggett|talk]]) 18:29, 27 May 2014 (UTC)
:Go on then and War in the Air....[[User:Keith-264|Keith-264]] ([[User talk:Keith-264|talk]]) 19:24, 27 May 2014 (UTC)
[http://www.greatwardustjackets.co.uk/page52.html Great War Dustjackets has a list here][[User:Keith-264|Keith-264]] ([[User talk:Keith-264|talk]]) 19:28, 27 May 2014 (UTC) :Made a start on the other publications[[User:Keith-264|Keith-264]] ([[User talk:Keith-264|talk]]) 13:07, 7 June 2014 (UTC)
::There's 80-odd titles now but I haven't found any Foreign Office or Treasury publications. Any ideas? Oh and I moved things around to be alphabetical, like the lists in the Battery Press volumes.[[User:Keith-264|Keith-264]] ([[User talk:Keith-264|talk]]) 15:38, 8 June 2014 (UTC)
== Additions == I'm probably going to doodle some detail about the production of the OH and rewrite or compress the Travers-Green section so as to use as much as possible for the general narrative rather than as an example using 1917 part II. [[User:Keith-264|Keith-264]] ([[User talk:Keith-264|talk]]) 16:13, 22 December 2015 (UTC) ::I've come to a dead stop to work on the unfinished Somme articles to get them done before 1 July.[[User:Keith-264|Keith-264]] ([[User talk:Keith-264|talk]]) 21:19, 11 March 2016 (UTC)
